TitlePage.Abstract: &Wedderga; package The title ``&Wedderga;'' stands for ``Wedderburn decomposition of a group algebras. This is a &GAP; package to compute the simple components of the Wedderburn decomposition of group algebras of finite groups over abelian number fields of characteristic zero and over finite fields. It also contains functions that produce the primitive central idempotents of group algebras of finite groups over the field of rationals and over finite fields.
